name: Project Doom: The Depths
description:
Early access to Project Doom: The Depths.

This version of Project Doom is basically: The return of Project Doom into a campaign

FEATURES:

  • Fully Shootable Guns
  • Bullet Dismemberment (If a body part gets hit 2 times it falls off)
  • Fully In-Tact Desert Environment
  • 2 Hidden Easter-Eggs

More Features Will Come When Full Game Is Released

NOTE: THIS GAME IS NOT COMPLETE THIS IS JUST A PROTOTYPE
